website_summaries.verdict: Peter Pan is a flavor that defines peanut butter for many people.
pros: Does not include high fructose corn syrup
Comes with a long shelf life
A good value on a large jar of this brand
A consistent taste you will remember from childhood

customer_reviews.title: PeterPan-Our favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Great-have kept this in our pantry for 60 years. Love it. It’s the best. Thanks for sending this order. We’re handicapped,can’t leave the house. God bless all Amazon workers and clients who are helping to keep our foods coming during the Crisis!ThankYou!
customer_reviews.author: RUserious_8

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: It's creamy, has a shelf date over a year out, and tastes exactly like it should. This is my favorite peanut butter, by far, and I picked this up rather than a regular size jar at $3 for 16 ounces. Honestly, I'm not saving much cash, but my inner hoarder is pleased, and I won't have to start scouring the grocery store ads every three weeks hoping it'll be on sale when I'm almost out of the little jar. I do use it for sandwiches, but it's mainly snacking on instead of resorting to candy...this way I at least get some solid protein rather than with straight candy. I'll actually be ordering this again sooner than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: KaraTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great Penut Butter, but a bit too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: This is a great peanut butter without doubt. It stays fresh and tastes good. My only complaint is that it's got a bit more sugar in it than I'm allowed to have (not diabetes), and it makes me sleepy, of all things! Most people won't react to it this way but I have a metabolic situation that makes it hard for me to handle sugars. For those who don't have such a problem, there's no issue. They can buy this, enjoy it, and purchase another one when the first one is (quickly) gone. Just read the label if you're sugar sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: CoolGramma

customer_reviews.title: Great value and available
customer_reviews.text: Our grocery stores don’t seem to carry Peter Pan since the recall several years ago for which they stood up and refunded all existing jars. I tried several different brands and even the healthy ones they say are better for you. Ha we will die either way so l say eat what you want with in reason and just put the fork down. Best peanut butter ever 😀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Peanut Butter, My Childhood Remembered!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in our area, also a large container, equals a win in our book! My mother always bought Peter Pan Peanut butter, but became increasingly hard to find in the last decade. We would find it occasionally at Grocery Outlets, but I decided to check Amazon out and found this and bought 5 lol! My momma’s happy, my childhood is back and my husband has switched over too!
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with the peanut butter itself but with the entire order. Our box was packed so tight, some of the jello busted and ruined and our veggie chip bag was busted open and it is stale. And some of our boxes were smashed.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: We eat a LOT of peanut butter in our house and Peter Pan is our favorite. It's hard to find these larger jars in the grocery store anymore, so was happy to find it available through Prime Pantry for a very good price. When a jar gets opened I immediately place a Pantry order to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Meledstick

customer_reviews.title: Looked nasty from the start
customer_reviews.text: Had to throw it out. Lid was separated with a black burnt look to it. Didn’t even attempt to eat it, it just went into the garbage. Will never order peanut butter like this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Green

customer_reviews.title: Peanut butter is liquid!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money but peanut butter is usually spreadable not pourable. Got the jar today, expiration date is a year away and the top of the peanut butter is liquidity...seriously and trying to contact Amazon is near impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Catomine

customer_reviews.title: Uh...Sheerness?
customer_reviews.text: I feel obligated to say the container was twice as big as I expected, but that's a personal error. I'm not sure what "Sheerness" is...but I'm giving 5 stars anyways because Peter Pan is better than Jif.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Cee

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE Peter Pan pb!
customer_reviews.text: I love Peter Pan peanut butter. It's the creamiest, most spreadable pb out there. It's not so dry it's hard to spread and you tear the bread, it's sweet enough to eat without jelly, and the peanuts don't taste burnt. Unfortunately, I can't find PPPB in my town anywhere anymore. At least Amazon has it. I prefer the creamy.
customer_reviews.author: anchorskid

customer_reviews.title: Yum! ...unless you have a family history of cardiovascular disease...
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would ditch the trans-fat*, but this is still my favorite peanut butter, based on taste... Work lunch = Peter Pan + American cheese + Sun Maid Raisin sandwiches. *The way the feds work label requirements, thanks to lobbyists, up to 1/2 gram trans fat per serving equals zero grams on the label...but the "hydrogenated vegetable oils" and "partially hydrogenated cottonseed oil" in the ingredients list tells you the trans fats are there... At 2-3 grams max per day for heart health, 0.5g per serving is significant...
customer_reviews.author: Paleomagick

customer_reviews.title: Best peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: When I was growing up, my family always bought the big 6lb cans of this stuff because we went through it really fast. Several years later, they had the recall and we could not find it anywhere for a few years. Local stores now carry this, but this 3 pack from amazon is just about the best deal anywhere. Of course I would love ordering a few 6lb cans, but that is actually more expensive. I love the taste of this peanut butter more than any other. I think it is more peanutty, and it is more creamy and spreadable than jif is. To have this peanut butter again certainly brings back many childhood memories! Good Job Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Peter G. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Yummy peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I liked this brand as a kid and it still tastes as good as it used to. It's just as good on toast as it is by the spoonful.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGal

customer_reviews.title: I am a peanut butter fanatic and loved the taste of Peter Pan
customer_reviews.text: I am a peanut butter fanatic and loved the taste of Peter Pan. I did not experience any of the other problems that people experienced. The peanut butter was not clumpy as others have said. In fact, it was very creamy. All three jars of peanut butter were exactly as expected and tasted great. If you're looking for a great deal on decent quality peanut butter, then look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Barretta

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this beand it has always been a good one that still tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: SSW

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Best peanut butter on the market! Can not find it at regular stores in California.
customer_reviews.author: Shrl

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Best peanut butter ever and low in carbs and sugar. I follow the lazy keto way of eating and this is perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: George Washington Carver would be proud!
customer_reviews.text: It's the best peanut butter on the market Oh, So Fresh So Smooth how stressed the right amount of oil to keep its creamy texture.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had Peter Pan in years and decided to give it a try. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Beadwabbit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and much better than the other brands
customer_reviews.text: Excellent...!!! Actually forgot about this brand even though I ate it all the while growing up. Been buying Skippy and Jif at warehouse stores and decided to check Amazon for peanut butter. Very happy I did as this is much creamier than the other brands and has a great taste.
customer_reviews.author: OldeCountry

customer_reviews.title: Only brand I eat.
customer_reviews.text: Only peanut butter I'll eat. Great value. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO

customer_reviews.title: Best Peanut Butter Ever
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this peanut butter so much, that it is hard for me to keep it stocked!!!! This is by far the BEST peanut butter around! If I can get ahold of it before it is gone to bake peanut butter cookies or peanut butter balls, my guests always ask what peanut butter I use because it is so peanutty!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Warf

customer_reviews.title: good tast
customer_reviews.text: Wat can u say about the best peanutbutter out their i luv igood tast n smoth
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Close to the same price I spend in the grocery store
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Power Food
customer_reviews.text: With good peanut butter, I don't use a spoon. I just scoop a huge handful out and eat it off my hand. And I keep scooping and eating until there's nothing left. This Peter Pan peanut butter comes in a big plastic jar, however, and you'll probably get a stomach ache if you eat it all at once. So keep some Rolaids around.
customer_reviews.author: hugh parker

customer_reviews.title: The only brand of peanut butter for me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm picky about only three brands: I only drink Coca-Cola if I want soda; I only eat Twizzlers if I want (non-chocolate) candy; I disdain all peanut butter that isn't Peter Pan! The rich, creamy texture defines peanut butter to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not as creamy as it should have been. Had to mix oil separation for at least 20-30 minutes. Still separated. Has small little bead's in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Deborah

customer_reviews.title: creamy, soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love this peanut butter! It's creamy, smooth and soft. I prefer this PB over Jif. Jif seems to be a harder consistency which makes it harder to spread. So go with Peter Pan! They also make a Whipped PB that is Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Britt D

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Between my kids and the dogs I go through a ton of pb I love the prime pantry price
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.text: You won't find a better price online or in stores. This is my one & ONLY Con-Agra food allowed in my house. #hangsheadinshame But I really LOVE this stuff. And at this price, delivered to my door? Oh. My. Head!
customer_reviews.author: G. P. C.

customer_reviews.title: delicious peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Something about the taste and consistency of this sets it above the rest. For me it is just slightly sweeter than other brands, which I find bitter by comparison. I also seems lighter, more "whipped" than some other, thicker varieties. Caveat emptor: The price can vary widely on Amazon. I have seen a range from $6-10 per jar, so do not automatically assume you are getting a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: persona non grata

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this peanut butter...use it to make my cookies with and is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: linda crandall

customer_reviews.title: my favorite peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite peanut butter!! It's creamy, smooth, and spreads easy.The balance of peanuts and sugar is perfect. It's not too sweet. I cannot stand when the taste of peanut butter butter is on the sweet side. This is my favorite go to lunch item(or breakfast if I'm in a hurry).
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy peanut butter.
customer_reviews.text: Love the jar size. Best flavor peanut butter. Not a lot of preservatives.
customer_reviews.author: J Ehrhart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always great! Been my favorite for as long as i can remember.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best PB out there
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Peter Pan Peanutbutter. I have always been a crunchy guy until one day while in my local B & M, I wanted a medium sized jar and all they had was smooth. I bought it and have been a smooth character ever since. Can't incorrectly pack this unless you're buying DVDs as well,(which I did and luckily they survived the trip).
customer_reviews.author: Otto Freischer

customer_reviews.title: Fifty plus years of using Peter Pan.  Still good.
customer_reviews.text: Best reliable peanut butter.... My parents used it when I was a child and I still use it. Hasn't changed. Still good.
customer_reviews.author: JeanA

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like organic peanut butter and/or if it's too expensive or ...
customer_reviews.text: If you don't like organic peanut butter and/or if it's too expensive or too pretentious, you really can't go wrong with name brand peanut butter that does not use high fructose corn syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of peanut butter for $12. Way cheaper than buying in-store - plus, Peter Pan isn't sold in our grocery stores and it's the brand my Grandma always used in baking - she wouldn't recommend any other brand. This is a great deal and I will be buying again when i finally run out of peanut butter!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Better than Jiff
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand of peanut butter! So much better than Jiff and all the knockoffs available now days
customer_reviews.author: Greg Martin

customer_reviews.title: WRONG FLAVOR
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Peter Pan Creamy Peanut Butter and received Honey Roasted Creamy Peanut Butter. I am not allowed to return the item because it's food. A rip off all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: mmmm
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love this peanut butter. My grandson even likes it. I have continued to order this from Amazon and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki H.

customer_reviews.title: A must have in the house
customer_reviews.text: One must to have in the house with growing kids, I am glad I can now buy this online with some other groceries and never run out.
customer_reviews.author: Cave Lady

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and creamy
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter is sweeter than most other brands of peanut butter. It's very creamy. I like it more than any other brand of peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer BaT

customer_reviews.title: A bigger hit than Justin Bieber
customer_reviews.text: Mmmm peanut butter. It's like well, butter. Tasty salty sweet thick peanutty butter. It's a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Kelley

customer_reviews.title: I Love Peter Pan PB!
customer_reviews.text: This s the PB grew up on. Jiff is just a little a too salty for my taste. I hope they bring Peter Pan back.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby & I really like Peter Pan peanut butter & this is a good price. It may be cheaper locally, but for a 3-pack, no tax & free shipping, works for me. Will order again, unless I can find it cheaper online or locally.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Low Carb!
customer_reviews.text: Only peanut butter I buy because it has the lowest carb count that I can find that still tastes delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Mondragon

customer_reviews.title: Good PB at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and the convenience of Prime Pantry. Will continue to purchase as long as price is less than in grocery stores. Expiration date is still well in the future, so no problems with old stock.
customer_reviews.author: Be-Co

customer_reviews.title: Move over Jiff and Skippy!
customer_reviews.text: This is some of the best peanut butter I have ever eaten. Its better than any other brand of peanut butter I've bought. Its smooth, creamy and tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Price for size and hard to find Peter Pan at my locals stores.
customer_reviews.author: jose a rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome buy. I go through a lot of peanut butter. In fact I buy this bargain deal every month. You cannot go wrong with Peter Pan.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years having grown tired of the "Store Brand" of peanut butter. Getting three 40 ounce jars at this price is like saving a couple of bucks over the grocery store jars times three. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Avert Inc

customer_reviews.title: Peter Pan’s the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Getting what you want means a lot,hard to find in stores,this size is perfect,,,,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PB at its finest.
customer_reviews.text: Best peanut butter on the market. Mixed with coconut milk and a dash of honey, it creates a dip worthy of the gods.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Jones

customer_reviews.title: The best creamy peanut butter.
customer_reviews.text: Peter Pan is the best. I always reach for the P.P. can.
customer_reviews.author: bbfan

customer_reviews.title: Yummy food gift!
customer_reviews.text: Sent these as a gift to my son, he loved them! Package arrived on time and as promised - who could ask for more?! This is the second time I've used these guys and I'll keep on using them - and recommending them too!
customer_reviews.author: pixie4paul

customer_reviews.title: Peter Pan peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Pantry purchasing is great, product is good price is great recommend purchasing
customer_reviews.author: pb

customer_reviews.title: Best taste
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this brand over all others. Large 40 ounce plastic jars at a very good price. Packaged well; no problems. Will buy these again. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter her own Peanut Butter because we can start introducing it. This is my husbands favorite brand. Very yummy peanut butter and less expensive on Amazon Pantry
customer_reviews.author: SAGedgaudas

customer_reviews.title: I love this peanut butter. I eat it right out of the jar.
customer_reviews.text: Peter Pan peanut butter is one of the best tasting, smoothest peanut butters in my opinion. However, it does contain sugar, as many of them do. If that is not a problem for you, you'll like it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Peter Pan peanut butter. 3 large containers .

customer_reviews.title: It's still good.
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me when we ate this as a kid. It's still good.
customer_reviews.author: ljm

customer_reviews.title: I am on my last jar
customer_reviews.text: You can't find this anymore in the stores here at Walmart or around anywhere. I love Peter Pan since I was a small child. I eat it by the spoonful. My favorite. Buy it and eat it. It is mmm mmm good!
customer_reviews.author: RosAnn

customer_reviews.title: Tastey peaunut butter
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved peter pan peanut butter! It's hard to find in stores these days. It taste great! And it came with 3 huge jars which made it an even better value. It's very smooth and speads easy also.
customer_reviews.author: Catloverlady

customer_reviews.title: Yummy yummy:-)
customer_reviews.text: Husbands favorite Peanut butter. He won't eat any other. I buy him the huge jars for Christmas and he smiles. Always on time. Quickly received.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake ;-)

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time and is of good quality. Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My husband eats peanut butter every night before he goes to bed so buying this product in bulk works for us. Delivered on time and is of good quality. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can order this online. First time I have tried peter pan brand and I really like it. Great for food storage as well.

customer_reviews.title: What I love most about this peanut butter is there is no ...
customer_reviews.text: What I love most about this peanut butter is there is no high fructose corn syrup so you can feel great about giving it to your kids. Tastes soo good too.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen P.

customer_reviews.title: Peter Pan: Always a favorite
customer_reviews.text: My local stores don't carry the family size jars. Ordering online is convenient and insures we never run out.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great services, carry larger size, and it's a good price too!

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love Peter Pan peanut butter and buying it like this makes it very affordable. If you have kids and they like this peanut butter, buy it here!

customer_reviews.title: I think JIF is better but very much a personal preference
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bunch and bought this in bulk. I think JIF is better but very much a personal preference. Nothing wrong with Peter Pan, good stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for product I usually purchase. Fast delivery. Will purchase again in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Great PB!
customer_reviews.text: Consistent and delicious, Peter Pan is a staple in our pantry!

customer_reviews.title: Love Peter Pan
customer_reviews.text: Can't get the large jars at Kroger. This is a great way to buy my favorite peanut butter while saving money at the same time!

customer_reviews.text: I love this BUT since they have doubled the price I was paying I'll buy it at the market for less a jar

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap peanut butter. We put it in the dog kongs when we leave for work for the day. The dogs love it!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic peanut butter Peter Pan yum
customer_reviews.text: My favorite all time peanut butter ..yumm on crisp apples heavenly

customer_reviews.title: Peter Pan!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in our local grocery stores. Especially in this size. Love this peanut butter!! My favorite.

customer_reviews.title: Good PB - Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good PB, if you want a good amount, but not a lot. I think the Jif six pack is a better deal, but this is a very fine one too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite peanut butter. I like is on all kinds of things.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice items, nice packing, Very pleased . A+ ALL THE WAY thank you. Highly recommended"

customer_reviews.title: We love peanut butter and this is pretty good peanut
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I thought it was going to be. We love peanut butter and this is pretty good peanut butter

customer_reviews.title: Nuts!
customer_reviews.text: I can fly! But be sure to have a glass of milk handy, or use jelly, jam or honey. You don't want to get your mouth stuck together. Good PB though.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Barak

customer_reviews.title: Its Peanut Butter time!!!
customer_reviews.text: I get these every two month. Perfect and yummy. Peanut Butter time. . .
customer_reviews.author: Blind Wolf

customer_reviews.title: peter pan..
customer_reviews.text: For my tastes, Peter Pan makes the very best peanut butter ever... It is creamy, not too sweet and not too salty.. Hmmm.. really good

customer_reviews.title: Quality peanut butter at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.text: A good price for a name brand peanut butter, buy enough to get free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: George Gates

customer_reviews.title: Peter Pan Creamy Peanut Butter, 40-Ounce Jars (Pack of 3)
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy on Peter Pan Peanut Butter. I received my purchase in 2 days. There is no reason to purchase elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Get your PB here!!!
customer_reviews.text: What else can is say - this is my fav peanut butter. Creamy. Best. Selller and shipper were A++++
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ann Elizabeth Hallissey

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Same peanut butter you buy in the store. So until the local stores lower their prices (not holding my breath on that) I'll keep buying here.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PB odd texture after shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good price, we love peanut butter in our household and our local grocery store stopped carrying the economy size so I was happy to find it prime and at a good price on amazon. This is the second time I have ordered it through Amazon and this time all of the peanut butter separated leaving the oil on top, I mixed them when opened and while that helped the texture wasn't quite the same. The taste was still the same and my boys never noticed the texture difference so no harm there. That is the reason for the 4 star review instead of the 5 stars that Peter pan deserves.
customer_reviews.author: SBishop

customer_reviews.title: Food for the gods
customer_reviews.text: I am a peanut butter addict and Peter Pan is the best of the the bunch, been eating it for 50 plus years.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Reding

customer_reviews.title: Not honey.
customer_reviews.text: Big. Creamy. Not the honey kind... I like the honey kind more... :/
customer_reviews.author: Nick Marcantonio

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: i gave a jar to each of my daughters for their apartments.. quick pb and toast before work... great value..
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Dabney  Ware

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this purchase. The product is much softer and runny and I have to stir it each time. Most disturbing is that it's pretty much tasteless. Since I've eaten this for years I know how it should taste. This is pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Peter Pan peanut butter is as good as it gets
customer_reviews.author: midnight

customer_reviews.title: Choosy moms choose Skippy
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as Skippy. Not a strong peanutty taste. This is thinner, but creamy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jane T. Michaels

product_meta.title: Peter Pan Creamy Peanut Butter, 40 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Peter Pan Creamy Peanut Butter is a smooth spread that brings out the simple pleasure of peanuts. Perfect for topping your morning toast or adding to your lunchtime peanut butter and jelly sandwich, Peter Pan Creamy Peanut Butter brings you that peanutty, delicious flavor that reminds you of childhood. Try all of the Peter Pan products to find your peanut butter preference.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :6.1 x 4 x 3.9 inches; 2.65 Pounds
 * Date First Available :April 22, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Peter Pan
 * ASIN :B00IAE3E9C

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars566 ratings Peter Pan Creamy Peanut Butter is a smooth spread that brings out the simple pleasure of peanuts. Perfect for topping your morning toast or adding to your lunchtime peanut butter and jelly sandwich, Peter Pan Creamy Peanut Butter brings you that peanutty, delicious flavor that reminds you of childhood. Try all of the Peter Pan products to find your peanut butter preference.
feature_bullets: Six 40 oz. containers Peter Pan Creamy Peanut Butter
A delightful creamy spread with a blend of peanuts
Fits a low carb lifestyle with 4g net carbs per serving (6g total carbs minus 2g dietary fiber)
